message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. Let's meet in the middle -  a 55/45 split seems fairer considering the inflation.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the money evenly this time.  I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to go after our previous offers.
